      • findBinFile

        public static java.io.File findBinFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Looks for a file in all possible bin directories.
        Returns:
        first that exists, or null if nothing found.
        See Also:
        findBinFileWithException(String)

                                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Looks for a file in all possible bin directories.
        Returns:
        first that exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if nothing found.
